title: How to Bake Easy Peanut Butter Blossom Cookies

steps.headline: Unwrap 60 milk chocolate candies and place in a small bowl.
Add the peanut butter, baking mix and vanilla to a mixing bowl.
Add sugar to a small bowl.
Place sugar-coated cookie balls onto a baking sheet.
Insert one chocolate candy into each warm cookie.

text: Preheat oven to 375 °F (191 °C).  Grease a baking sheet.  Unwrap 60 milk chocolate candies and place in a small bowl.  Add the peanut butter, baking mix and vanilla to a mixing bowl.  Mix until a dough forms.  Add sugar to a small bowl.  Shape dough into 1-inch balls.  Roll balls in sugar.  Place sugar-coated cookie balls onto a baking sheet.  Bake cookies 6 to 8 minutes.  Insert one chocolate candy into each warm cookie.  Let cookies cool and serve.  Finished.
